story.title: Our Story
story.paragraph1: Founded in 2015, Bakırcılar Automotive has been operating in the automotive industry for over 10 years. We offer services in a wide range from vehicle sales to rental services, from expertise services to maintenance and repair.
story.paragraph2: By prioritizing customer satisfaction, we have become a respected brand in the industry with quality vehicle solutions and reliable service approach. With our experienced automotive experts and wide vehicle portfolio, we provide solutions suitable for every need.
story.paragraph3: With our customer-oriented service approach, quality assurance and principles of providing reliable automotive solutions, we act thinking about both today and the future.

aboutPage.visionDetailed: To become a leading sales and service company in the automotive industry by meeting constantly changing customer demands at the highest level in the Turkish automotive market.
aboutPage.missionDetailed: To contribute to our customers' safe driving experience by offering comprehensive and professional automotive solutions without compromising our principles of quality, trust and customer satisfaction.
aboutPage.valuesSubtitle: The core principles that shape our business processes
aboutPage.statsSubtitle: We are pioneers in the industry with years of experience and our strong team
